name: Slow Cooker Pork Noodle Soup
description: Asian-style pork noodle soup made in the slow cooker with star anise, ginger, soy sauce, and bok choy.
ingredients: 4-8 cups chicken broth (enough to cover pork)
instructions: Put all ingredients into crock pot except bok choy, noodles, and cilantro.
Add chopped bok choy - cook for 20 minutes.
Ladle into bowl, top with cilantro.
